sentences.sContent: Pop it under the grill for five minutes.
sentences.sCn: 把它放在烤架下烤五分钟。

words.tran: 炙烤（grill的过去式和过去分词）

remMethod.val: gr + ill(生病) → 严刑拷打会打出病的 → 拷问

trans.tranOther: a part of a  cooker  in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below
if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
